com.punchline.javalib.utils

Class SoundManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.punchline.javalib.utils.SoundManager

  • public final class SoundManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper for playing all game audio, including both sound effects and music.
    Author:
    Nathaniel

        public SoundManager()

    • Method Detail

      • dispose

        public static void dispose()
        Disposes of all sound effects and music, and removes them from the SoundManager's memory.

      • getSoundVolume

        public static float getSoundVolume()
        Returns:
        The current sound volume, from the range [0, 1].

      • setSoundVolume

        public static void setSoundVolume(float volume)
        Sets the current sound volume.
        Parameters:
        volume - The new sound volume. Must fall in the range [0, 1].

      • getMusicVolume

        public static float getMusicVolume()
        Returns:
        The current music volume, from the range [0, 1].

      • setMusicVolume

        public static void setMusicVolume(float volume)
        Sets the current music volume.
        Parameters:
        volume - The new music volume. Must fall in the range [0, 1].

      • addSound

        public static void addSound(java.lang.String key,
            com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle soundHandle)
        Adds a sound effect to manager's memory. This sound can later be played by calling SoundManager.playSound() with its key.
        Parameters:
        key - The key that will be used to play this sound later.
        soundHandle - A FileHandle pointing to the sound effect.

      • removeSound

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Sound removeSound(java.lang.String key)
        Removes a sound effect from the manager's memory, and returns it so it can be disposed. It's a good idea to do this when a sound is no longer being frequently used.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the sound effect to remove.
        Returns:
        The removed sound effect.

      • playSound

        public static void playSound(java.lang.String key,
             float volume)
        Plays a sound effect.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the sound effect to play.
        volume - The volume to play the sound effect at.

      • playSound

        public static void playSound(java.lang.String key)
        Plays a sound effect.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the sound effect to play.

      • addSong

        public static void addSong(java.lang.String key,
           com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle songHandle)
        Adds a song to the SoundManager's memory.
        Parameters:
        key - The key by which this song can be played.
        songHandle - A FileHandle pointing to the song.

      • removeSong

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Music removeSong(java.lang.String key)
        Removes a song from the SoundManager's memory, and returns it for disposing.
        Parameters:
        key - The key by which this song can be played.
        Returns:
        The song, for disposing.

      • playSong

        public static void playSong(java.lang.String key,
            float volume,
            boolean looping)
        Plays a song from the SoundManager's memory.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the song to play.
        volume - The volume to play it at.
        looping - Whether the song should loop.

      • isMusicPlaying

        public static boolean isMusicPlaying()
        Returns:
        Whether there is any music playing from the SoundManager.

      • isMusicPaused

        public static boolean isMusicPaused()
        Returns:
        Whether a song is currently paused.

      • pauseMusic

        public static void pauseMusic()
        Pauses the current music, if there is any playing.

      • resumeMusic

        public static void resumeMusic()
        Resumes the current music, if there is any paused.
